DOC.brief_summary: This study is to investigate correlation between Carotid Intima Media Thickness (cIMT) and several factors such as; hs C-reactive protein (CRP), HbA1c, lipid profile in Korean diabetic patients with atherosclerosis. Total 360 patients will be enrolled through 6 sites.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Subclinical Atherosclerosis and Its Associated Factors in Hyperlipidemic Korean Adults With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: patients with Diabetic Mellitus patients with dyslipidemia patients who have established cardiovascular disease patient using NSAID
DOC.keyword: Corelation between cIMT (carotid intima media thickness)
Cardio Vascular risk in Diabetic Mellitus
